00014 #ifndef __MLPACK_METHODS_SPARSE_CODING_DATA_DEPENDENT_RANDOM_INITIALIZER_HPP
00015 #define __MLPACK_METHODS_SPARSE_CODING_DATA_DEPENDENT_RANDOM_INITIALIZER_HPP

00017 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00018 
00019 namespace mlpack {
00020 namespace sparse_coding {
00021 
00027 class DataDependentRandomInitializer
00028 {
00029  public:
00039   static void Initialize(const arma::mat& data,
00040                          const size_t atoms,
00041                          arma::mat& dictionary)
00042   {
00043     // Set the size of the dictionary.
00044     dictionary.set_size(data.n_rows, atoms);
00045 
00046     // Create each atom.
00047     for (size_t i = 0; i < atoms; ++i)
00048     {
00049       // Add three atoms together.
00050       dictionary.col(i) = (data.col(math::RandInt(data.n_cols)) +
00051           data.col(math::RandInt(data.n_cols)) +
00052           data.col(math::RandInt(data.n_cols)));
00053 
00054       // Now normalize the atom.
00055       dictionary.col(i) /= norm(dictionary.col(i), 2);
00056     }
00057   }
00058 };
00059 
00060 }; // namespace sparse_coding
00061 }; // namespace mlpack
00062 
00063 #endif
